entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
